title.rendered: SUNGUY Short Micro USB Cable Right Angle 30cm [2Pack,0.3m x2] 90 Degree Reversible Micro Connector Fast Charging & Data…

content.rendered:
Colour Name:0.3M * 2

Specifications
– Color: Black+Blue
– Length:0.3m/1ft
– Material: Insulator TPE
– Design:90 Degree Angle
– Connector: Reversible micro connector
– Support quick charging;
– Support speeds as much as 480 Mbps

Compatible with :
– Samsung Galaxy S7/S7 Edge / S6 / S6 Edge / S4 / A5 A7 A9, Note 4 5 Tab professional A S2
– Moto G4 / G4 Plus / G4 Play / G5S / G5s Plus / G5 / G5 Plus / E4 Plus / E4
– Huawei P9 Lite / P10 Lite /Mate 10 Lite / Mate 8 /Honor 6X
– LG V10 / G4 / Stylo 2 / Stylo 3 Plus / G Pro 2
– Nokia 6 / 5 / 3,Google Nexus 6 / Nexus 7
– Lonve Blue 16GB MP4/MP3 Player and Sansa Clip+ 8 GB MP3 Player
– Amazon Kindle Fire HD and HDX
– And good for extra units with Micro USB Connector.

Warm Tips
– Reversible Micro USB cable is totally different from customary micro connector,When you place it into the charging port,please press it into to connecting your units.

SUNGUY 12 Month Warranty
– If there may be any drawback with the cable used through the guarantee interval, please contact us for substitute or refund (Artificial harm besides).

Package Contents:
2 Pack 0.3m/1ft 90 Degree Short Micro USB Cables

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
[90 Degree Design] – 0.3M Micro USB cable with proper angle 90 diploma design,while you use it cost your telephone ,cable and the telephone stay parallel,It eliminates the danger of cable splitting.
[Fast Charge and Data Transfer] – USB 2.0 Micro cable help 2.4A quick charging,Compatible with QC2.0 ,QC 3.0.It ensures information switch as much as 480 Mbps.
[Reversible Micro Connector] – 90 diploma Micro USB cable use reversible connector.Just put it within the port and press it frivolously to cost it simply. Especially appropriate for evening use, older folks use.
[Wide Compatibility] – Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S6 S7 Edge / Note 5 4 / A10 / Tab 3/Tab 4, Motorola Moto E5 / E5 Plus / G5 / G5 Plus / G5S / G5S Plus, Huawei P10 Lite, Nexus 6,Nokia 6 / 5 / 3, LG V10 / G4,Amazon Kindle, E-Readers, PS4, PS4 PRO, Xbox One and extra units with micro connector.
[12-Month Warranty] – You will obtain 2 Pcs 30cm/0.3m proper angle micro usb cables,Enjoy 12 Months Worry-free Warranty and lifelong pleasant buyer help. If any questions please contact us by way of Amazon Email or SUNGUY Customer Support Email（help@sunguymall.com）.
